post:
Swiftnode.net offers performance dedicated, game, and virtual private servers. All of our support staff is experienced in server administration, networking, ddos mitigation, and all staff has at least 5 years in a fast paced support environment. We mitigate hundreds of DDoS attacks towards our customers every month without downtime. Our network is constantly monitored for anomalies and attacks. We can mitigate volumetric attacks (Layer 3/4) as well as application layer attacks. (Layer 7) We maintain a 99.9% monthly uptime in all of our locations, have rapid hardware replacement SLAs, and absolutely none of our support staff is outsourced.

Swiftnode LLC is a registered company in the state of South Carolina.

About Our Services


  • 20Gbps DDoS Mitigation Included FREE
  • Native English Support Staff Available 24-7-365
  • Optimized Routing (via Noction or InterNAP FCP)
  • Transparent Uptime Monitoring (Provided by Uptime Robot)
  • All servers provisioned within 72 hours. (Average deploy time: ~12 hours)
  • Public Uptime Statistics
